overview:
Dr. Alon Dumanis is the CEO of Docor International Management, a Dutch Venture Capital, subsidiary of The Van-Leer group Foundation. He has been involved in several international companies, in international business development, entrepreneurial and technological management of high-tech companies in the information, aviation, electronics and emerging technology domains. He serves as a member of the board of directors in many companies, including El Al Israel Airlines. Prior to this, Dr. Dumanis was the Head of The Material Command in the Israel Air Force with the rank of Brigadier General.

He has managed multi-billion dollar R&D programs, engineering, security, information technology, logistics and acquisition, Air-Force infrastructure programs and other projects. He was a member of various notable steering committees for the Minister of Defense and the Israel Defense Forces Chief of General Staff, for national level technological road mapping and information technology.

Dr. Dumanis has received prizes, honors and awards including the Purdue University “Outstanding Aerospace Engineer of 2001 Award.” He is a chairperson and member of several national steering committees and is the author of many papers published locally and internationally in a number of domains including Technology and Management.
